# Load packages

```{r, results='hide'}
install.packages("hsdar")
library(hsdar)
library(ggplotify)
library(cowplot)
library(magrittr)
library(purrr)
```

```{r}
list.files("/data/patrick/mod/hyperspectral/atm-cropped", 
                    pattern = "laukiz[0-2].tif$|luiando.tif$|oiartzun.tif$", full.names = TRUE) %>%
```
